metadata.title: CVE-2024-40896 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In libxml2 2.11 before 2.11.9, 2.12 before 2.12.9, and 2.13 before 2.13.3,the SAX parser can produce events for external entities even if custom SAXhandlers try to override entity content (by setting "checked"). This makesclassic XXE attacks possible.

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
